title: [Large-Scale] Transdisciplinary Integrated Curriculum Design Workshop Based on the IB-PYP Framework

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary curriculum structure and foundational IB-PYP framework concepts
context.additional_context: Course focused on strengthening collaborative curriculum design competencies for pre-service and in-service language education teachers

learning_goals: Explain curriculum design principles aligned with the 6 transdisciplinary themes of the IB-PYP framework (Who we are, Where we are in place and time, etc.) with over 80% accuracy
Develop integrated lesson plans that incorporate 3 or more disciplinary domains using collaborative brainstorming techniques
Create transdisciplinary curriculum assessment rubrics and perform 2 or more revision cycles based on peer feedback
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
